isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - IDENTIFICATION - THIRTEEN-SPEED MANUAL TRANSMISSIONS

svcproc.title: THIRTEEN-SPEED MANUAL TRANSMISSIONS
svcproc.para: The transmission is identified by the number "13" in the Speed portion of the model number ( Figure 2).
The transmission uses thirteen forward gears (five gears in the LO range and eight gears in the HI range that are divided between four DIR gears and four O/D gears) and two reverse gears.
The transmission may be either a "Design Level 1" or a "Design Level 2."
The auxiliary case is different from the nine-speed and the ten-speed transmissions.
